TITLE: Manchin touts inflation reduction bill, says 'I'm not getting involved' in upcoming elections
SUMMARY: Sen. Joe Manchin, D-W.V., spoke about the Inflation Reduction Act on multiple talk shows and repeatedly failed to answer questions about midterm elections.

TITLE: Watch live: Biden addresses the nation after U.S. strike in Afghanistan kills top al-Qaeda leader
SUMMARY: Sunday's drone strike is the first known CIA counterterrorism operation since Kabul fell to the Taliban last year.

TITLE: Biden administration faces midnight court deadline to defend $350 billion of Trump's China tariffs
SUMMARY: The Biden administration faces a legal deadline at midnight to defend Trump's China tariffs, even as the White House considers scaling them back.

TITLE: Koch network pressures Sens. Manchin, Sinema to oppose $739 billion tax-and-spending bill
SUMMARY: The Inflation Reduction Act of 2022 promises to raise $739 billion in revenue by setting a minimum corporate tax rate and changing Medicare drug pricing.

TITLE: Man accused of duping Secret Service by posing as Homeland Security agent pleads guilty
SUMMARY: Authorities said multiple Secret Service agents, including one who protected Jill Biden, wife of President Joe Biden, were duped in the scheme.

TITLE: Biden reveals drone strike killed al-Qaeda leader al-Zawahiri, warns terrorists we will ‘take you out’
SUMMARY: Sunday's drone strike is the first known CIA counterterrorism operation since Kabul fell to the Taliban last year.

TITLE: White House struggles to insulate Biden's China policy from Pelosi's Taiwan trip
SUMMARY: American officials have long stressed that Pelosi's choice to visit Taiwan was hers alone, and not official U.S. policy. Experts now say that misses the point.

TITLE: Jan. 6 texts of Trump Defense officials wiped clean by Pentagon, court filing shows
SUMMARY: Attorney General Merrick Garland was asked to investigate the of the Pentagon to maintain texts from the day of the Jan. 6 Capitol riot by Trump supporters.

TITLE: Biden to sign bill boosting China competition and U.S. chip production
SUMMARY: The Chips and Science Act includes more than $52 billion in funding for U.S. companies producing computer chips, among other provisions.

TITLE: DOJ sues to block new Idaho abortion law, first challenge to a state after Dobbs ruling by Supreme Court
SUMMARY: Attorney General Merrick Garland announced the first DOJ suit on abortion access since the Supreme Court overturned its ruling in Roe v. Wade.

TITLE: China ratchets up military and economic pressure on Taiwan as Pelosi begins her visit
SUMMARY: House Speaker Nancy Pelosi landed in Taiwan's capital of Taipei on Tuesday night for a controversial visit that has infuriated Beijing.

TITLE: Pelosi's Taiwan trip is a new headache for Biden, increases tension with China
SUMMARY: American officials have long stressed that Pelosi's choice to visit Taiwan was hers alone, and not official U.S. policy. Experts now say that misses the point.

TITLE: Russia faces 'economic oblivion' despite claims of short-term resilience, economists say
SUMMARY: Russia is facing "economic oblivion" in the long term as a result of international sanctions and the flight of businesses, several economists have said.

TITLE: Eric Schmitt beats former Gov. Eric Greitens in Missouri GOP Senate primary, NBC projects
SUMMARY: The results mark a major defeat for Greitens, who fully embraced former President Donald Trump as he looked to claw his way back to the political fore.

TITLE: Trump-backed gubernatorial candidate Tudor Dixon wins Michigan Republican primary
SUMMARY: Dixon, who is endorsed by ex-President Donald Trump, will face incumbent Democratic Gov. Gretchen Whitmer, who ran unopposed in the primary.

TITLE: Pelosi's trip to Taiwan is like 'pouring salt in an open wound for China', Stephen Roach says
SUMMARY: The top U.S. lawmaker met Taiwan President Tsai Ing-wen on Wednesday in a highly controversial visit that has angered Beijing.

TITLE: Overwhelming abortion right win in in 'red' Kansas gives Democrats boost for fall midterms over 'MAGA' GOP, Schumer says
SUMMARY: Democrats say concern about abortion rights in light of a Supreme Court ruling tossing out Roe v. Wade will motivate voters in upcoming elections.

TITLE: New York's ritzy Hamptons plays host to over a dozen political fundraisers this month as midterms approach
SUMMARY: The wealthy New York enclave of the Hamptons is playing host to over a dozen political fundraisers this month as the November midterms approach.

TITLE: Trump still holds sway in GOP as MAGA candidates win in key primary races
SUMMARY: Multiple Trump-backed winners in key primary elections have cast doubts on the 2020 election results.

TITLE: Biden signs executive order to help cover costs for women traveling for abortions
SUMMARY: The Biden administration has considered using emergency public health powers to protect access to abortion pill, mifepristone.

TITLE: UN secretary-general urges governments to tax 'immoral' oil and gas profits
SUMMARY: He added that the funds, which equate to $100 billion in the first quarter of this year should instead be used to support vulnerable communities.

TITLE: Overwhelming abortion right win in 'red' Kansas gives Democrats boost for fall midterms over 'MAGA' GOP, Schumer says
SUMMARY: Democrats say concern about abortion rights in light of the Supreme Court ruling that tossed out Roe v. Wade will motivate voters in upcoming elections.

TITLE: WNBA star Brittney Griner sentenced to nine years in prison by Russian court
SUMMARY: The decision comes one week after the Biden administration confirmed it made an offer to Russia for the release of Griner and former U.S. Marine Paul Whelan.

TITLE: Two Trump children questioned in New York Attorney General probe, ex-president set to talk in coming weeks, report says
SUMMARY: The Trump Organization is under investigation for manipulating asset valuations for financial gain. Three Trump children have now been questioned in the probe.

TITLE: Pelosi’s Taiwan trip puts the world's biggest chipmaker back in the spotlight of U.S.-China rivalry
SUMMARY: Semiconductors have become a key part of the rivalry between the U.S. and China with TSMC, which dominates chipmaking, caught in the middle.

TITLE: Biden will keep aircraft carrier group in the South China Sea but postpone missile test
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden will keep a U.S. aircraft carrier strike group in the South China Sea longer than originally planned but postpone a scheduled missile test.

TITLE: Former Vice President Dick Cheney rips 'coward' Trump in election ad for daughter Liz
SUMMARY: The ad came as polls show Cheney trailing her top Republican opponent, Trump-backed Harriet Hageman, by wide margins.

TITLE: Trump likely to be criminally charged in DOJ election probe along with other former White House officials, Obama AG Holder says
SUMMARY: Former Obama Attorney General Eric Holder said a Georgia prosecutor is more likely to act sooner than the Justice Department against Donald Trump.

TITLE: Biden administration declares monkeypox outbreak a public health emergency in the U.S.
SUMMARY: The U.S. has confirmed more 6,000 monkeypox cases over the past two months, more than any country in the world.

TITLE: Two Trump children questioned in New York attorney general's probe, ex-president set to talk in coming weeks, report says
SUMMARY: The Trump Organization is under investigation for manipulating asset valuations for financial gain. Three Trump children have now been questioned in the probe.

TITLE: Trump-backed Arizona GOP governor hopeful Kari Lake wins primary, NBC projects
SUMMARY: Lake will advance to the general election, where she will face off against Democrat Katie Hobbs, currently Arizona's secretary of state.

TITLE: Watch live: Schumer takes questions on massive climate, tax bill after securing Democratic support
SUMMARY: Chuck Schumer will take questions on a massive climate, health and tax bill after he secured support from the last Democratic holdout.

TITLE: Liz Cheney urges the Justice Department to prosecute Trump if it finds evidence of crimes
SUMMARY: The question of whether Trump should be prosecuted for his attempt to subvert the 2020 election continues to divide the anti-Trump wing of the Republican Party.

TITLE: Schumer says Sinema left 'no choice' but to cut carried interest provision from tax and climate bill
SUMMARY: Sinema backed the bill after the removal of a provision to narrow the so-called carried interest loophole, a tax benefit that both Biden and Trump opposed.

TITLE: Companies have been fleeing to low-tax states. Here's why that may be bad news for workers
SUMMARY: The best states for businesses may be the worst states for workers.

TITLE: Large Indiana employers Eli Lilly and Cummins speak out about the state's new restrictive abortion law
SUMMARY: Eli Lilly, one of the biggest employers in Indiana, said that the state's newly passed restrictions on abortions will push it to grow away from its home turf.

TITLE: President Joe Biden tests negative for Covid-19 after rebound case
SUMMARY: President Joe Biden tested negative for Covid-19 but will continue to isolate, according to the White House.
